description: Design and development from scratch of a Web Application and its Content Managment System, which shows market information and analysis about Indexes. I took business requirements and turned them into application functionalities, leading the entire development and delivery of the project.
Developments and maintenance of a flagship application. Moved the application to AWS and improved several heavy SQL queries that resulted in an overall load speed improvement of ~30%.

Development from scratch of a Data-driven Web Application in a Bank environment, working full-stack with Javascript (ECMAScript 6), a OOP language (JAVA) and a functional programming language (Clojure). I worked in an Agile team, interacting with technical and non-technical people (front-office).

Development, mainly with Java 8 using a TDD approach, of an Application for Document Management that allowed users to upload and view documents. Exposed Web Services to external applications using a micro-services architecture.
Full-Stack Development of a JAVA eCommerce (plus Project Management Application), working in a highly specialised Web Agency.
Development of a small Client Application using C#.
Development of a Facebook Chatbot using NodeJS and a NO-SQL DB.
Front-end and Back-end development of a B2B eCommerce for an important client (MSC Cruise Company), working in an Agile big team (following Scrum rules).
Front-End and Back-End Development of a Management Web Application.
Banking consultancy (SSM) for an important Italian Bank (Intesa Sanpaolo) working on a Big Data project.
